description: {"blocks":[{"key":"n4g2","text":"Part two of the HTTM protocol. A low-cost and high-throughput Tn-seq protocol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aom7l","text":"This part cover the DNA extraction from cell pellets of transposon insertion mutants and subsequent silica columns regeneration. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b7coh","text":"While still warm, add  of ethanol 100%, without overmixing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"5gsji","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bsd43","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"k9fq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"260","error":false,"guid":"20801EC0563B11ED9C6711A7A6865681","id":"92154","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"boo2k","text":"Overmixing will result in DNA agglomeration and difficulty with the extraction.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"96v1f","text":"Transfer immediately to a deep-well plate fitted with an array of silica columns. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
